# Gamma spectrum for Lutetium 177
# (first line is 1 0 to say it is a discrete spectrum)
# Two main lines : 113 KeV and 208 KeV
# http://www.nucleide.org/DDEP_WG/Nuclides/Lu-177_tables.pdf
# sum 0.001726+0.0620+0.000470+0.1038+0.002012+0.00216 = 0.172168
1 0
0.0716418  0.001726
0.1129498  0.0620
0.1367245  0.000470
0.2083662  0.1038
0.2496742  0.002012
0.3213159  0.00216
